Posts.Content: Hello I'm new to a message board so here goes; three weeks ago I had a mammogram it showed a 2cm mass in my left breast. A week later I was sent for a spot compression mammogram and an ultrasound. The spot compression came back 1cm. A week later the ultrasound came back showing speculated (star sharp)lesion BI-RADS 4 suspicious for malignancy no measurement. Made an appointment with a breast surgeon for a biopsy. That appointment is over 2 weeks away which feels like forever. I know i'm not suppose to worry but it seem that all I do. I count the days I can't really talk to anyone because all I get is don't worry. Has anyone been through this?
Posts.Title: suspicious mass

Posts.Content: Hello I would be petrified as well, they must have found something and call you back because they want to be sure. sometime it could be a shadow given your family history. They want to be sure and that's a good thing, you don't what them to be to quick to say negative only to find something later. All the best to you let us know how it turn out.
Posts.Title: im new here and scared
